From Figma Wireframe to zenCSS Landing Page

Work in progress. Go from a Figma wireframe to a fully-built landing page with zenCSS. Since zenCSS is set up with your brand's design, it allows for an easy transition from grayscale wireframes in Figma to a well-designed, on-brand website.

Examples

Above is an example our Figma file which served as a starting point for our landing page. You can review the full design here, or see the final web design using zenCSS below.

Currently, zenCSS's mobile support and company logos component have not yet met our standards. We are actively working on improving these features.

The Zen Test

Every part, section, and modifier we ship pass alignment, style, and functional tests to ensure they perform flawlessly in today's modern browsers.

So you can be assured it "just works". Try it out below.
